title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Executive Order on Nat’l Monuments (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Executive Order on Nat’l Monuments (Audio)
description:
Charles Warren, partner at Kramer Levin Naftalis & Frankel, and John Leshy, professor at University of California, Hastings College of the Law discuss President Trump’s executive order that could rescind national monument designations. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio’s "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
